mapper.insert: insert into user (uid, user_name, user_salt, user_password, user_email, user_phone, user_gender, user_avatar, user_role, user_status, user_registdate, user_registip, user_lastloginip, user_address) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userRegistdate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userRegistip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_salt = #{userSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_gender = #{userGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_avatar = #{userAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_role = #{userRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_registdate = #{userRegistdate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_registip = #{userRegistip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_lastloginip = #{userLastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid, user_name, user_salt, user_password, user_email, user_phone, user_gender, user_avatar, user_role, user_status, user_registdate, user_registip, user_lastloginip, user_address from user where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select uid, user_name, user_salt, user_password, user_email, user_phone, user_gender, user_avatar, user_role, user_status, user_registdate, user_registip, user_lastloginip, user_address from user
